I

IM - Static variable in class network.NetworkConstants
 
IM_ID - Static variable in class network.NetworkConstants
 
IMMessage - Class in client
Represents an IM message.
IMMessage(String, String, String, boolean, int) - Constructor for class client.IMMessage
Constructor for IMMessage.
IMServer - Class in server
IMServer is a Runnable that listens to a specific socket, corresponding to a specific port and IP address, for user connections, on the thread that calls run().
IMServer(int) - Constructor for class server.IMServer
Creates a new instance of IMServer on the specified port.
IncomingMessageManager - Class in client
Handles incoming communication from the server.
IncomingMessageManager(BufferedReader, ClientGUI) - Constructor for class client.IncomingMessageManager
 
inConvAndConnectedAndUserDoesNotExistAddToConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect an error message to be sent when a non-existent user is added to a conversation by a user who is already in the conversation.
inConvAndConnectedAndUserExistsAndIsInConvAddToConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect an entered conversation message to be sent when a user is added to a conversation by a user who is already in the conversation if the user he adds is also already in the conversation.
inConvAndConnectedAndUserExistsAndIsNotInConvAddToConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect enter conversation message to be sent to a user and an added to conversation message to every other user when a user is added to a conversation by a user who is already in the conversation.
inConvEnterConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect an entered conversation message to be sent when a user who is already in a given conversation sends an enter conversation message requesting to join it.
inConvExitConvTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect a removed from conversation message to be sent to all other users in the conversation when a user who is in a given conversation sends an exit conversation message requesting to leave it.
inConvMultipleUserIMTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect IM message to be sent to all clients in a conversation when the sender of an IM message is in the conversation and other clients are also in the conversation.
inConvOneUserIMTest() - Method in class server.ServerTest
Expect IM message to be sent to the sender when the sender of an IM message is in the conversation but no other clients are in the conversation.
INIT_USERS_LIST - Static variable in class network.NetworkConstants
 
isCanceled() - Method in class client.DefaultMessageToServer
 
isCanceled() - Method in class client.IMMessage
 
isCanceled() - Method in interface client.MessageToServer
Checks whether the message has been canceled.
isPending() - Method in class client.IMMessage
Returns whether or not this message is pending.
